messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in why are we still here just to suffer station's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Since you lazy asses won't do the station goal, we are sending you the equipment. You will receive compensation for setting up the shield generator satellites.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in why are we still here just to suffer station door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Mount Everest is approximately 29,000 feet tall. With 1,000 Anakins in play, Obi-Wan has 29 feet of high ground per Anakin.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in why are we still here just to suffer station's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So you've fought in Vietnam. that's cute. We gamers have been there too. As well as in ww1, ww2, the French revolution, the crusade, the ancient Egypt and in the caveman age, so don't mess with us sissy ass vet. We had to relive it multiple times, battle after battle. See our friends die right in front of us. We are gamers.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.
